document.full_text: the investigation surrounding a secretive deal to export natural gas to israel at a low price has already resulted in the arrests of egypt's former oil minister and five other top officials.
document.title: mubarak faces more questioning on gas deal with israel
lines_and_colors: the investigation surrounding a secretive deal to export natural gas to israel at a low price has already resulted in the arrests of egypt's former oil minister and five other top officials.
